vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Greeks living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.4;
son of: Javan (H3120);
brother of: Tarshish (H8659), Kittim (H3794) and Dodanim (H1721)
§ Elishah = "God of the coming (one)"
descendant of Noah, son of Javan; perhaps ancestor of the Aeolians
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijo de Javán; descendiente de Jafet
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利沙 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在外來字的意思是 "即將來的 (那一位) 神"
挪亞的子孫, 雅完的兒子
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利沙 这个阳性专有名词 人名在外来字的意思是 "即将来的 (那一位) 神"
挪亚的子孙, 雅完的儿子

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Another name of kit.ti (כִּתִּי "Cyprus" H3794H)
§ Elishah = "God of the coming (one)"
descendant of Noah, son of Javan; perhaps ancestor of the Aeolians
